thread.section_title: CrystalPlus.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CrystalPlus.com | crystalplus.com
thread.title: Hugo Cuevas-Mohr

author: Hugo Cuevas-Mohr
title: Hugo Cuevas-Mohr
text:
First, the Globe Tower 101003 Large does not have a globe on top, it is a half globe. So only shows the Americas, the rest of the world is missing. For a Globe award that's misleading.
The Apex Global Award 102293 came with no globe on top as it was shown on the picture. The picture not only was online but on all the emails confirming the order.
The 3rd was perfect and the quality of the products is great, that's why I gave them 2 starts instead of just one.
